title: Samsung details Good Lock 2022 with app support on Z Flip 3 cover display, Pixel-like app drawer
content:
Samsung’s One UI skin on top of Android opens up several big features that the stock operating system just doesn’t offer. And, things get even crazier with the company’s “Good Lock” system that really unlocks the full capabilities of your phone. This week, Samsung has finally posted a changelog for Good Lock 2022 and the goodies it delivers.

more…

The post Samsung details Good Lock 2022 with app support on Z Flip 3 cover display, Pixel-like app drawer appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung has detailed Good Lock 2022, with new features including apps for the Flip 3's outer display, and a Pixel-like app drawer.
